resources.string:
Step 1: Lie on your back with your knees bent, feet flat on the floor, and your arms extended by your sides.

 Step 2: Pushing through your feet and bracing your core, raise your bottom off the ground until your hips are fully extended, squeezing your glutes at the top.

 Step 3: Slowly return to the starting position and repeat.
Activate your core and posterior chain.\nThis is a great exercise to use as a warmup.
Whether the gym isn’t your thing or you’re short on time, clear out a space in the living room and prepare to sweat!!
